setEffects.4: Opening a chest regenerates 30% Max HP over 5s.

flower.name: Adventurer's Flower
flower.desc: A resilient flower that survived the harsh environment of an ancient city. It is now proudly worn like a medal.

plume.name: Adventurer's Tail Feather
plume.desc: The feather of an exotic bird rarely seen on this continent.

sands.name: Adventurer's Pocket Watch
sands.desc: It's easy to lose track of time when you're adventuring where the sun doesn't shine, whether that's the depths of the abyss or the ruins of a lost city.

goblet.name: Adventurer's Golden Goblet
goblet.desc: The spoils of one of an adventurer's many expeditions. Though a little damaged, it is still an excellent find.

circlet.name: Adventurer's Bandana
circlet.desc: A cloth garment worn at the forehead. Though soaked in sweat and covered in dust, it still beams with an adventurer's pride.
